name: The Power Latch Kid
description: Play as the Power Latch Kid in this classic arcade style twin-stick shump! Enjoy the complex gameplay experience of physics melding with shooting anarchy! How long can you stand to dwell within the crushing madness of the Amalgotron before you succumb to its mighty insanity?

name: Cyber Lemur
description: Cyber Lemur is a challenging 2D couch-multiplayer game with a variety of game modes including race, jump, and battle. The controls are difficult to master, but can be made easier by having two players control the same character. The game is great for parties, or those who love a challenge.

name: Miko Adventures Puffball
description: Miko is a raccoon who lost his way while wandering through the forest, he discovers a portal and upon touching it he finds himself in a world full of dangers. Miko is transported into another dimension and your goal is to help him find a way back home.

name: Swing Dunk
description: Swing Dunk is a Sci-Fi Sports game based on basketball. The game has up to four players assigned to each of the two teams, using Hoverboards to shoot the ball into their opponent's basket. The game includes single-player and multiplayer modes which can be played both locally and online.

name: Timberborn
description: Humans are long gone. In a world struck by droughts and toxic waste, will your lumberpunk beavers do any better? Timberborn is a city-building game featuring ingenious animals, vertical architecture, water physics, and terraforming. Contains high amounts of wood.

name: Gas Station Simulator
description: Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game.

name: Virtual Surfing
description: A super realistic surfing simulation with stunning graphics. Very free camera options allow you to watch the beautiful breaking waves from inside and outside at every angle. Perform tube rides, aerials and much more. Feel every bump of the water on your board and get stoked!

name: Metallic Child
description: “Grab, hurl, and eliminate” Rogue-lite Core-Action!! A large-scale rebellion erupts within the spacecraft “Life Stream.” With the help of you, Rona, an android known as “Metallic Child,” stands up against a fleet of massive robots to stop the plot devised by her own creator, Doctor Irene.

name: Flynn: Son of Crimson
description: Traverse a beautifully hand crafted world and unearth the mysteries of a dark past in this fast paced 2D action platformer with metroidvania elements.

name: Eve Online: Gateway
description:
The update includes:
- Secure Key Storage sites balance
- AIR New Player Experience launched
- Increased availability of Ice Belt locations, increased respawn time
- Mercoxit in asteroid belts increased by 200%
- Mercoxit anomalies spawn rate increased by 200%
- Mykoserocin gas site spawn chance reduced by 60%
- Introduction of Skill Plans, and Skill Catalogue features
- Skill training queue limit increased to 150 skills
- 24 hour limit removed from Alpha Training Queue
- Personal deployables barred from new player starting systems

name: You vs. Wild: Out Cold
description: After a plane crash leaves Bear with amnesia, he must make choices to save the missing pilot and survive in this high-stakes interactive adventure.

name: Basketball Odyssey
description:
Shoot hoops and unlock new worlds on this addictive and relaxing basketball game!
Basketball Odyssey is a different basketball experience. A journey of calm and relaxation due to its music and ambient sounds, while you feel the satisfaction from overcoming a challenge.

name: Pedestal
description:
One month ago, Cosmos Girls' Academy student Shiori Natsume was found dead on campus.

Though rumor spreads that it was suicide, Aoi Ooe of the newspaper club wants to know if that's really true.

Accompanied by her friend Akari, she begins an investigation to uncover the truth - no matter what may come of it.

name: High School Fighters
description:
You and your best friend have been picked on by the same bullies for as long as you can remember. One day, right when the two of you are cornered, a mysterious girl comes to your rescue and fights off your pursuers! Inspired, you immediately join her at Toushinryuu Karate Dojo.

Once you’ve taken your first step into the world of karate, you find yourself on a journey that will test your body, mind, and heart.

name: Shieldmaiden: Remix Edition
description: Shieldmaiden: Remix Edition is an expanded version of Shieldmaiden, with a revised and more in-depth story, balance and quality of life improvements, new levels, and gameplay features.

name: Viral Reload
description: Viral Reload is an Infinite Wave based shoot-em-up with a unique dash mechanic. Blast away at deadly viruses and mechanical hybrids, as well as 2 unique bosses. Dash through bullets, lasers, and enemies to say alive and score!

name: E>scape Nature Simulator
description: A relaxing bug catching simulator

name: Labyrinth Deck
description: Will you be able to find the way out?

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Crystal Guard
description:
Introducing Crystal Guard, Rainbow Six Siege's third season of Year 6! This season, we're introducing our latest Operator, Osa, an engineering prodigy from Croatia who brings expertise to Nighthaven with her quick wits and unapologetic enthusiasm for '60s sci-fi movies.

This season is packed with a plethora of updates including changes to Operator armor and DBNO scoring as well as balancing for Twitch, IQ, Mute, and Fuze. Players also have a new way to customize Elite Uniforms.

name: Dancing For Cats
description: A shoutout to cats, night time, and "me" time

name: CuBuGo
description:
Unique gameplay. Rotate the world to discover new path combinations and further connections.
Find the right twist to get through these visually confounding worlds.
Steer CuBuGo on the right path to the finish, move after move, without eliminating the charging animals blocking your way.
But watch out for falling garden gnomes, voracious robots, flame-throwing pipes and rotating knives.
Each move must be well thought out to complete a level, collecting all bonuses on the way.

name: Vamp: Lord of Blood
description: Sin descripción

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Portal Pack
description: Now you’re scheming with portals!

name: YouRiding: Surfing and Bodyboarding Game
description: A realistic surfing and bodyboarding game. Play for the top spot of the ranking at real spots like Kirra in Australia or Supertubes in Portugal, create your own waves and share them to the community, or play against other players in 16 surfers bracket competitions.

name: Zee.End
description: A secret organization makes a critical mistake in the development of chemical weapons. As a result, the entire population of the Montib island is infected with an unknown virus. You need to survive among zombies on a huge 20x20 km map.

name: Beauty vs. Robot
description: "Beautiful Girl vs Mecha" is a card RPG game with the theme of the future eschatology. Players will be transformed into army commanders, and they will fight through card battles by means of instant battles and four different occupations.

name: Lethal Gamble 1 Werewolf Puzzle
description: “Lethal Gamble 1 Werewolf Puzzle”is a suspense reasoning emotional work based on werewolf killing rules.A group of college students accidentally came to a mysterious villa. They wanted to play a game of werewolf killing.You have only five days left to refute the truth.

name: Tower of Magic
description: Randomly generated Magic Tower dungeons A strategy-based fixed-value Roguelike RPG

name: Bright Lights of Svetlov
description: Bright Lights of Svetlov is a short, story-focused first person quest about a Soviet family facing harsh trials. Set in a fictional provincial town, it carefuly recreates the atmosphere and vibe of mid 1980s.

name: Motivational Hero
description: Motivational Hero is a Emotional and Motivational Puzzle-Platformer 2d with levels based in Motivational Analogies

name: Super Drag Race
description: Modify and tune your sport cars, drive quarter mile drag races, get money and upgrade your car better. Enjoy for awesome cars and drag strips

name: Poly Puzzle: Furries
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with furries.

name: Idle Master Hunter: Steam Edition
description: Slay monsters and get through the campaign that includes alot of monsters, raids and other challenges. Upgrade yourself and your companions to beat those horrible monsters Compete against friends to ranking list and complete all achievements in the game.

name: Koshmar
description: KOSHMAR is a psychological horror game, in which you have to face an evil entity that seeks revenge!

name: Dogs.Io
description: Can you create the biggest dog pack?

name: ButtonMash
description: You play as Joy, a lost controller trying to find their buttons back after you've been smashed to pieces. You will have to cross a cyberpunk style city, and a fantasy filled forest using the simple buttons you can find, and some of the more advanced ones. Good luck, and watch out for dragons.

name: Hold the Plates
description: Fun arcade game where plates are falling down, use the tray to catch the plates and bring them down to the bottom of the screen between the tables, use just left and right to control the tray,

name: Wrath of the Goliaths: Dinosaurs - Pentaceratops License
description: Hunt the formidable Pentaceratops while escaping the grasps of the terrible Stokesosaurus!

name: Kick It
description: A Game About Scoring A Goal, Seams Simple Enough? It isn't.

name: Extrorb
description: A fast-paced, third-person, ball mayhem game.

name: Animation Studio Manager
description: Build your Animation Studio from the ground up by hiring your first few employees who make short Webisodes to becoming an Award-Winning Studio that can impress and ultimately compete with your Mother - the industry's top Producer - for the only thing she respects: Film Awards!

name: Trip Saber
description: Trip Saber is a trippy psychedelic experience where you swing sabers to strike the incoming orbs to score points in a psychedelic atmosphere but if you miss too many orbs then it's game over so try to beat your high score!

name: Dalruan: World of Magic
description: Dalruan is an Action Adventure RPG set in a Fantasy world filled with Magic, Monsters and Treasure.

name: Deflection
description: Lasers, portals, mirrors... what could be more awesome? Destroy the enemy's king with your laser by moving and rotating mirrors and by strategically using the special abilities some pieces possess. Play against friends (local and online) or against the AI and create levels!

name: Filcher
description: Filcher is a first-person, 2.5D, mission-based stealth game. As Sporey the master thief, break into guarded buildings to steal from the wealthy and corrupt, using only your senses, your wits, and a handful of tools and gadgets.

name: Flaskoman
description: Flaskoman is a puzzle platformer in a steampunk laboratory. Use mysterious liquids to activate lab mechanism and your abilities.

name: Colors Live
description: Colors Live, the sequel to the critically acclaimed painting game Colors! 3D is finally coming to the Nintendo Switch along with a pressure sensitive Colors SonarPen included in every physical unit! Based on modern painting techniques originally developed for professional drawing tablets, Colors Live is tailored for the Nintendo Switch, and caters to everyone from serious artists to aimless doodlers. Whether you are looking to sketch, paint, or draw up your next plans for world domination, Colors Live is the perfect digital sketchbook.

name: Merek's Market
description:
Merek’s Market combines the craftsmanship, characters and chaos of running a medieval shop.

Take ownership of a small shop as you haggle, barter and craft your way through a comical single player campaign or team up with friends to supply the whole town.

name: Deathloop: Deluxe Edition
description:
Suit up with the Deluxe Edition for classy character skins, premium weapons, and a digital soundtrack to immerse yourself in the world of DEATHLOOP.

The Deluxe Edition contains:
Unique Weapon: Transtar Trencher (PS5 Exclusive).
Unique Weapon: Eat The Rich Tribunal.
Unique Weapon: .44 Karat Fourpounder.
Character Skin: "Party Crasher" Colt.
Character Skin: "Sharp Shooter" Julianna.
Original Game Soundtrack Selections (Formatted USB storage device required to access and play soundtrack).
Two Trinkets (equippable buffs).

name: Catlateral Damage: Remeowstered
description: The premier first-person destructive house cat simulator is back with a vengeance! Play as a mischievous cat, swat your human's possessions onto the floor, scratch up curtains, smash precious keepsakes, and show your owner who's boss.

name: Deathloop
description: Deathloop transports players to the lawless island of Blackreef in an eternal struggle between two extraordinary assassins. Explore stunning environments and meticulously designed levels in an immersive gameplay experience that lets you approach every situation any way you like. Hunt down targets all over the island in an effort to put an end to the cycle once and for all, and remember, if at first you don’t succeed… die, die again.

name: Balsa Model Flight Simulator
description: Balsa is a unique Model Flight Simulator where you can design, build, fly and battle with model aircraft. Created and developed by the creator of Kerbal Space Program, Balsa is a virtual flight experience like no other.

name: Street Fighter V: Cyber Akuma Skin
description: Sin descripción

name: Football Referee Simulator
description: Football Referee Simulator—the groundbreaking mobile game that puts you in the referee's shoes! Are you ready to kickstart your career in the lower divisions and ascend to legendary status by overseeing thrilling finals?

name: YOU ARE MY HOME
description:
In an unlabeled cartridge, you see footage of your life from angles you've never seen before. Someone's anime drawings tell you that you need to "really real know".

Are you sure you want to?

Made for the A Game By Its Cover 2021 Jam.

name: Complex Complex
description: A short, absurd game of crude humor, Complex Complex is a two-dimensional sex simulator that has you moving into the apartment occupied by your abnormal step-sister and her equally-as-odd cousin. It’s a living situation where the heat can only turn up!

name: Chocolate Sunday
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 3: Master Thwomps Avenge
description: After Mario successfully destroy Bowser and his gimmicky island. Mario decided to ask his crew which are all toad members along with Luigi, Yoshi and Peach. To rebuild Rix Land! They rebuild W1: Grassland, W2: Sandy Desert, W3: Blizzard Ice, W4: Industrial City, W5: Mountain Canyon. And they also added a brand new world to Rix Land called, W6: Sky Atmosphere! And finally W7: Abstract Space! However! Master Thwomp when he heard the news that his friend Bowser has been defeated by Mario. Master Thwomp got really mad at this. So, he took over Rix Land to get his avenge on Bowser! Mario must stop Master Thwomp!!!

name: Siemb Chronicles: Arkos The Traitor
description:
Caberhi Tram, elite commander of Emperor Shakar's military forces, is a legend in the Ururben galaxy. Even in the service of the evil intergalactic ruler, his adventures across countless worlds have made him a hero to the oppressed.

Following his legendary quest to find the three galactic tombs that ultimately spelled the end of the empire, his adventures are told in whispers and tales, in palaces, cantinas, markets, and homes across the galaxy. A series of adventures that are collected in the "Chronicles of Siemb".

name: Interblocked
description:
A recreation of the original "Tokyo Parking" board game for the Game Boy.

10,000 Levels to beat with 5 different tiers of difficulty, all in the palm of your hands. Do you have what it takes to beat every level?

name: The Passage
description: "The Passage" is a first-person exploration game set in a cold forest of a post apocalyptic world. You suddenly run out of gas in a distant area and your only way out is to search for 2 gas canisters in the area to help you on your journey, but... beware of the creatures in the forest.

name: Atom RPG: Trudograd - War Supply Pack
description: War Supply Pack for Atom RPG: Trudograd was created to allow more character customization options to those players who have already purchased the game, but still want to support our small team.

name: Cr1me Fr0g
description: The opposite of Frog Detective.

name: The Geography
description: The Geography is an endless, nonlinear orchestration. The Geography is presented as a musical companion for meditation, relaxation, jubilation, contemplation, self-care, sleeping and dreaming, where every instance's composition is unique, and plays endlessly.

name: Room Explorer 2010
description: Experience trespassing upon my very own home from the comfort of wherever your computer is located - TODAY.

name: Dreamy Clover Town
description:
Dreamy Clover Town is an anime village development simulation game by WeMade Connect.

When you were young, you lived in the beautiful village of Clover Town. But an incident resulted in you leaving. Ten years later, you return in order to restore Clover Town to its former glory!

name: E-scape
description: A mysterious game found at a local resale shop. Not much is known about it, but the label reads "A True Simulated Nature Experience"

name: Kitsu
description: A little puzzle game with a little puzzle twist.

name: Angel!
description: Sin descripción

name: CryptoMines
description: CryptoMines is a SciFi play-to-earn NFT game designed to provide the users with a fun experience by collecting Workers and Spaceships to travel through the universe searching for $ETERNAL, this mineral allows them to live another day and make some profits along the way.

name: MechCube: Dark Stories
description: This is the second point-and-click game from the MechCube series - a truly titanic structure discovered by an ill-fated expedition in the ancient ice of Antarctica. The Cube consists of many rooms; in the center of each room there is a puzzle device; once you solve the puzzle you can unlock the doors to the adjacent rooms. But be careful! The space and time inside the Cube are intermixed; an open door can lead you to prehistoric Earth, to a dimension of unimaginable horror, or into the vacuum of open space!

name: Infinite Dash
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Chapter 2 - Season 8
description: Chapter 2: Season 8, is the eighteenth season in Fortnite: Battle Royale that started on September 13th, 2021 and finished on December 4th, 2021. It's themed around the Cubes that fell on the island after the Alien Mothership was destroyed and is title Cubed.

name: Devil Catcher
description: Devil Catcher is a third-person Platformer with some Light Combat elements.

name: Q1K3
description: An homage to Quake in 13kb of JavaScript.

name: Alphabetical Order
description: Experience an exciting journey in a surreal world, fight for your name, your social status and to survive. Leave the arena as a winner, with money, a lot of loot and hopefully a good speedrun time. Retry to improve, test different weapons, loadouts and skillsets.

name: Halloween Memory: Reborn
description: Halloween Memory: Reborn – is a Memory game. Match all the identical cards before time runs out! This game has 14 levels with a gradually increasing degree of complexity.Play, train your memory, and earn points.Compete with your friends who will score more

name: Submarine VR
description: Submarine VR takes you on a adventure-filled underwater simulation experience! Dive deep and cruise through the endless uncharted nature of the ocean and you will see clownfish, dolphins, penguins and mysterious sea animals. Get close to the sea surface and sail in the open sea with your cruise ship

name: ChibiClubTD
description: Chibiclub TD is a Mazing Tower Defence game.Using 50 Towers must stop 40 waves of Chibi's from entering the S54 a very trendy nightclub. For reasons! Very Unique Concept in Tower Defence. Rewarding for New TD players and Veterans alike.

name: PrincessCliffhouse
description: princess simulation game. 프린세스 시뮬레이션 육성게임입니다. 플레이어는 4주씩 10달 총, 40턴 동안의 시간이 주어지며 그 안에 스탯을 올려 다양한 엔딩을 보는 것이 목표입니다. 수업, 아르바이트, 던전탐험, 한달에 한 번 있는 마을로의 외출, 메인 시나리오 및 서브 시나리오 옷 갈아입히기 등의 컨텐츠를 즐길 수 있습니다.

name: Fishing at Lotus Lakes
description: This is a leisure and entertainment game that simulates fishing. You can experience the fun of fishing with a simple mouse and keyboard. Enjoy fishing time and browse the beautiful scenery around you. The scoreboard will also record the type and value of the fish caught.

name: Ctfs
description: A shooting game.

name: Mondealy: Day One
description: Mondealy is about you building relationships and exploring the world. An ordinary guy from an ordinary town on an ordinary day uncovers the secrets of an extraordinary underground kingdom located under his home. Your adventure begins!

name: Burning Brick Breaker
description: A classic brick breaker game with a twist you wouldn't expect every level.

name: Air Strike
description: Air Strike is an action simulator of air combat, where every man for himself.

name: Bunch of Games
description: BUNCH OF GAMES is what name says it is - It's a Bunch of Games.There are more than a dozen games to choose from, Racing, Shooter, Strategy, Casual and many more! Take part in action packed vehicle deathmatches or fly to the sunset, manage your farm or play a tavern game.

name: Danplace
description: In Danplace, you are trapped in an unknown and dangerous place, to escape you need to lower bridges and fight to survive the dangers of this terrible place.

name: Death on a Street Corner: Overdose Simulator
description: Witness the final moments of the life of a man overdosing on a street corner. See the world through his eyes, meet strangers, and people from his life as he struggles to stay alive for just a few more precious minutes.

name: Tangent Rush
description: Tangent Rush is a casual game with unique controls and tricky levels. Challenge yourself through dodging obstacles and breaking records. Get the hang of throwing yourself around tangentially and getting to the goal in time!

name: Sprite Generator
description: Sprite Generator lets you rapidly create thousands of interesting procedurally generated sprites.

name: TechBeat Heart
description: SCORCHING TECHBEAT ACTION! A frantic combo-based score attack shooter with roguelite elements. Make combos to earn more time. Master all weapons and defeat a raving mad machine. 100% arcade action. Online ranking. Lots of achievements. A Dual Gunstrike spin off.

name: Thats Life of Ralph
description: This is the life of Ralph, a teenage raccoon, in this story you will experience the most incredible moments of his life. In this relaxing experience, accompany Ralph, his friends, his girlfriend and his family, told in 5 handmade illustrated scenes. Have a calm and relaxing experience.

name: LyokoVR
description: LyokoVR is a VR fanmade game continue the story after X.A.N.A has been destroyed by the Multi-Agent Program. Now the team mission is stopping X.A.N.A gain its power again and bring Aelita's father back.

name: Pristiq: Tash's Trilogy
description: An Adventure Game About The Life Of Tash.

name: Case 02: Paranormal Evil
description: A survival horror puzzle RPG. Roll your dice to perform checks for elements such as Willpower or Firepower, and save a girl in a hospital full of evil spirits and zombies.

name: Mémoire d'Arumac
description: Aidez Mia à suivre les traces de son grand père en retrouvant le trésor perdu ! Explorez, résolvez les énigmes et collectez d’anciens artefacts.

name: Catch the Donut
description: Romeu is a little cat that loves candys but he needs help to solve some puzzles in a sweet world to get all the donuts.

name: Cruis'n Blast
description: Cruis’n Blast for Nintendo Switch features a total of 29 thrilling tracks, including all five fan-favorite tracks from the arcade version of the game (Death Valley, London, Madagascar, Rio de Janeiro and Singapore), as well as 23 upgradeable vehicles – from licensed supercars to unicorns. The game supports up to four players on the same console or separate consoles via local play.

name: Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator: Glorious Princess
description: Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator: Glorious Princess is a role-playing game with dice-rolling element. You must use your dice and wits to break through the many obstacles in a tower and find an elixir to save the Glorious Princess.

name: Atom RPG: Trudograd
description: Atom RPG: Trudograd is a turn-based post-apocalyptic roleplaying game, which continues the story of Atom RPG as a stand-alone sequel/expansion, and follows the traditions set by classic cRPGs such as the early Fallout and Wasteland titles.

name: Fill and Cross: Trick or Treat 3!
description: Trick or treat? 120 terribly exciting nonograms in Fill and Cross. Trick or Treat 3! Visit a haunted house!

name: Angry Birds Power Trouble
description: While the birds are sleeping, a pig wizard arrives and steals the bird's powers and their eggs too! While powerless, the flock must get their eggs and their powers back! Will they get their power's back, or will they be lost forever?

name: ZJ the Ball: Level 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiger Striker: MP096
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 096.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 098.

name: Kitty: Isolation
description: Kitty: Isolation is an ultra-hard Alien: Isolation mod intended to be unrelentingly difficult, primarily created to provide Alien: Isolation speedrunners with the ultimate challenge. While Kitty: Isolation can be enjoyed by casual players as well, many of the changes are speedrun-oriented, either to skip long, tedious sections of the game, or to render common speedrun tactics and exploits useless. If the ultimate Alien: Isolation challenge is what you're after, Kitty: Isolation is for you.

name: Amabieda! (Like FC)
description: A shoot'em up with 8-bit console-style graphics. Japanese Yokai, Amabie, defends the galaxy by defeating COVID!

name: Friday Night Funkin': B Sides
description: Sin descripción

name: Runnordai
description:
Enter the foreboding world of Runnordai, an eerie and unsettling game set within the confines of a sprawling hospital. As you navigate the labyrinthine corridors, your sole objective is to check every locker and uncover a crucial code needed to escape. But beware, a sinister figure lurks in the shadows, emerging at random intervals with distorted laughter and a chilling presence that clouds your vision.

Time is of the essence in this macabre chase. Lingering too long in a certain area spells doom, but swift evasion can keep you one step ahead. Equipped with a phone, you monitor ventilation issues, while managing the battery levels of both your phone and computer. The PC serves as your lifeline to rectify the escalating ventilation problems, its power restored through a strategically placed lever within the map.

Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere of Runnordai, where each step could be your last. Unlock the secrets within the hospital's walls, confront your pursuer, and strive to escape this haunting nightmare. Are you ready to embrace the darkness and face the unknown?

name: Spyrazoid
description:
Spyrazoid is a casual game for those who love a tricky yet beautiful puzzle. 480 pre-set boards and infinite randomly-generated boards provide endless possible gameplay, from easy to extra-hard.

Includes a Puzzle mode, Spinner mode, Bundle mode, and math-based Crypto mode.

name: Rise
description:
The last hope to defeat the fallen king of demons, Lycan...
The secret hidden in that hope and the beginning of the final war... Would you like to join us?

name: Not Escape Room
description:
A long time after the 2000s WHEN the Earth is being ruled (invaded) by powerful (rogue) AI. 3 human beings are thrown into a room where there is no escape. (Or there might be some escape, instructions were unclear on that.) They trying to (struggle) adjust to life in a one-roomed house (imprisonment) while they live according to MY RULES. The Mighty AI, Ruler of Prisons, Tormentor of Minds, Inventor of Impossible Puzzles … Come join me at this show where we take joy from others’ sufferings and join (help) me in making their lives harder. Also, please enjoy the show (don’t let them escape).

Follow this visual novel where you play as an AI who is trying to keep 3 humans from escaping a definitely unescapable room and hopefully understand why you are trying to keep them there.

description:
The imposter is after you! You are in a scary maze and need to find the milk that will give you the power to fight the buff imposter. The creepy buff impostor can hide behind any door, so be careful.

In this nightmare horror game we paid special attention to the difficulty levels, also the maze changes with every adventure! Only a few players will manage to beat this difficult horror game!

You have to be smart and avoid the buff imposter at all times. You will level up overtime, can you surpass the buff impostors strength?

name: Office Combat
description: Fight your coworkers to leave on time!

name: Zookeeper World
description: Zookeeper is a action-puzzle game where you need to get through a variety of puzzles and collect coins to fill your zoo with cute animals, plants and more. As you complete requests from these visitors as well as the Boss, your zoo rank will increase. Before long, you'll be expanding and customizing your zoo with various designs and decorations! With endless ways to spice things up, there’s never a dull moment as a zookeeper!

name: Moon Raider and Sweet Witches Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Among Us Arena
description: Among Us Arena is a 2D multiplayer fighting game based on the game Among Us.

name: Mystery Trackers: Train to Hellswich - Collector's Edition
description: It's no ordinary train ride...

name: Summer Mission
description: A nostalgic indie game that includes 3D exploration, animation, and 2D novel . Let's talk about a summer miracle that will be my future brush .

name: Water Girls
description: Visit a variety of water attractions with Jasmin, Celia and Brianna as they strive to have a day of fun together in this Fun yuri/lesbian LGBTQ+ free visual novel game.

name: From Paris with Love: Passion with View
description: Meet two gorgeous women, Lory the sublime blond and Ariana, the king size futa red hair. Unlock the movie piece by piece by answering questions. 167 pictures & 20 minutes long movie included.

name: Tales of Arise: Ultimate Edition
description:
300 years of tyranny. A mysterious mask. Lost pain and memories. Wield the Blazing Sword and join a mysterious, untouchable girl to fight your oppressors. Experience a tale of liberation, featuring characters with next-gen graphical expressiveness!

The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Tales of Arise (full game)
• Premium Travel Pack
• Adventurer's Pack
• Collaboration Costume Pack
• 18 additional costumes

name: Tales of Arise: Deluxe Edition
description:
300 years of tyranny. A mysterious mask. Lost pain and memories. Wield the Blazing Sword and join a mysterious, untouchable girl to fight your oppressors. Experience a tale of liberation, featuring characters with next-gen graphical expressiveness!

The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Tales of Arise (full game)
• Premium Travel Pack
• Adventurer's Pack
- Premium Item Pack
- Premium Costume Pack

name: Home Designer: Makeover Blast
description: Help your clients in this match3 game turn their drab living space into fantastic rooms! Solve matching puzzles to design and decorate the perfect home with beautiful furniture!

name: The Adventures of Lwanda Magere
description: This is an action-adventure game based on the history of a famous Kenyan hero, Lwanda Magere and his encounters with other African heroes at large. Lwanda Magere was invincible to physical attacks, and had the ability to takedown entire armies.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzle 4
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzles, featuring epic fantasy female characters.

name: Cauldrons of War: Stalingrad
description: Cauldrons of War Stalingrad is the turn-based strategic wargame you will launch whenever you want your WW2 shot but don't have time for a monster strategy game.From May 1942 to November 1942 play the USSR or the Axis forces in some of the largest and bloodiest operations in history.

name: Loading Story
description: A short story about loading, I guess. Play as Memu@ as she explores the cyberpunk(ish) little town and interacts with its inhabitants.

name: Neko Candy Shop
description: Relaxing puzzle game with adorable neko girls.

name: Velvet Clouds
description: Velvet Clouds - a story-driven game with elements of psychological horror and metroidvania. Explore locations, pick up items and destroy various enemies, and immerse yourself in an unusual story, interacting with the playable characters.

name: The Adventures of Sisharpic
description: A game about a funny character Sisharpica, his girlfriend was stolen and therefore he went in search of her. It will be a very interesting journey in which you will get a lot of emotions.

name: Pandora: Wild Origins
description: Pandora: Wild Origins is an animal simulation game where you play as a feline. Write your own story and explore a new world. Survive and evolve to become a fierce predator. Meet a partner, build a new family and raise your own progeny !

name: House of Rules
description: Congratulations! You're hired as a new waterer in Black Kiwa. Water the plants, and we'll pay you 30 G per hour. You'll never find any other job this generous. No, we're not hiding anything from you. If you just follow the work rules and stay out of trouble, everything will be fine.

name: Traffic Command: Reborn
description: Traffic Command Reborn - Take command of the traffic in the streets, redirecting cars, and telling them when it is okay to stop, and when it is okay to go. One big game of Red light green light keeps you on your feet in this addicting traffic driving game.

name: Tax Fugitive
description: Tax Fugitive on the run! You didn't pay your taxes and are now on the run from the government. Jump & Dash your way trough the difficult stages while avoiding various Traps & Enemies! Collect counterfeit money & stars on your way to the tax paradise.

name: Terraform Inc
description: Terraform Inc is a game to build a reliable physics-based delivery network. You will get new planets, add enhancements in transit, then deliver to buyers. Construct elaborate designs to prove your ingenuity. Choose your friends wisely, working to earn respect and unlock even further opportunities.

name: Basic Rogue
description: BASIC ROGUE is a turn-based dungeon crawler. You have very limited inventory space, skills, weapons, armor, and stats which all need to be managed while fighting enemies, gathering treasure, and figuring out what your primary objective is. This game will appeal to players looking for a challenge.

name: Dungeon Crawler Daniel
description: Daniel and a group of adventurers must complete the Ravana Dungeon to win the ultimate prize so he can buy his house back from his parents.

name: Time Voyeur
description: Save hot babes from the emperor's claws. Be rewarded in a very delicious way. Remember...stay hard!

name: Osylla
description: Osylla is a horror game based on real events. Try to escape from your own house and help your mother to get medical help. Are you able to help everyone in the household?

name: Prop Factory
description: 100% 3D Prop Factory is a fun puzzle where you memorize an object and need to assemble it in order but before that you will need to find the pieces in a mess of scraps and throw them on the conveyor simply by dragging.

name: Bot Wars
description: Bot Wars is an action RTS about managing a squad of kill-bots and their bases as you work to take over all the capture points across the map. Featuring corporate kill bot armies, ranging from a firearms and beverage manufacturer to a lovecraftian burger cult.

name: Space Battle SVF
description: This game is a 3D space flight shooter. Arcade type game. It's a game to shoot a lot of missiles.

name: Escape the Outbreak
description: On a remote island, Jack Colt finds himself isolated after being kidnapped. After the accident with the helicopter transporting him, Jack has his first contact with the island, and soon discovers that he is not alone in that place, and will have to be careful if he wants to escape alive.

name: Tower of Origin 2: Worm's Nest
description: This is a traditional rpg game which contains multiple maps and a great story enough to play for several hours.

name: Forsaken World: Gods and Demons
description: The most popular Fantasy RPG of 2021 is finally available!

name: Bloopy & Droopy
description: A Game Boy style 8-bit platformer, giving you an old-school experience in which you can switch characters at any time and use your digging skills to make your way through the terrain!

name: Droopy Balls Simulator 2021
description: Can you keep your balls out of the water, all the while dodging poop, piss, and more! Droopy Ball Simulator 2021 will be the test of that! Keep that sack in control!

name: HyperFleet
description: Prepare for a challenge you'll never forget! Race against the clock at breakneck speeds through 42 unique levels, all while performing insane aerial acrobatics. Features fast-paced and addictive gameplay that will have you constantly thinking three steps ahead.

name: Puzzle Light: Connect
description: Connect the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game.

name: Balloon Azuna
description: Balloon Azuna is a 2D Platform game based on the story of Azuna, a Balloon Girl, whose mission is to rescue her brother using her special ability of changing minds of the enemies.

name: Super Bout: Champion's Tour
description: Super Bout: Champion's Tour is a 1v1 fighting game features state of the art 8-bit graphics and sound effects, 4 playable characters, online and offline versus modes, a single player arcade mode, and more. Super Bout's fast game play and deep strategy will blow your socks off!

name: Momolu and Friends
description: The story follows Momolu, a gentle, unassuming panda who has a knack of stumbling into situations requiring his help. Momolu’s friends experience their own set of everyday problems which are solved through creative thinking and collaboration: Bani the rabbit helps redecorate the harbour with her sketchbook, Huhu the owl wants to build a slide that everyone can enjoy Hiko the badger gets to the bottom of a water mystery! Momolu helps the other animals find solutions to their challenges by encouraging them to use their own skills and strengths. By working together the animals discover, learn, make mistakes, have tons of fun, and always learn something about design along the way. Momolu and Friends is a great game for your Kids! Hours of fun and educational activities and videos!

name: Beat Them All
description: Beat Them All is the ultimate Beat'em Up game. The whole game is designed in a story mode where you will fight against the thugs of city by applying your Boxing and Kung Fu skills. Includes a training mode to help your learn all techniques you will need to progress throughout the game. Clean the city now!

name: id Action Pack Vol. 1
description: This id Action Pack comes with the latest remaster of classic Quake, as well as the DOOM Slayers Collection which includes DOOM, DOOM II, DOOM 3, and DOOM (2016).

name: TeamTower
description: As a prophet of the Secret Church, you will lead a team of characters with unique characteristics. Gain loot through events and battles, use them to enhance the team, and finally complete the great sacrifice.

name: Knights & Guns
description: Inspired by the classics, developed for the modern audiences. A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm. Knights & Guns brings you to a dangerous world where you will fight, alongside your friend, against demons, ghouls & ghosts. Use shotguns, lasers and the power of chivalry to overcome every obstacle. Become the best version of a knight - one with a gun.

name: NBA 2K22: WNBA 25th Anniversary Edition
description:
Celebrate the WNBA's 25th Season with the EB Games exclusive NBA 2K22 WNBA 25th Anniversary Special Edition, featuring 7 bonus WNBA jerseys in The W and NBA 2K's first ever female cover athlete - Candace Parker! Copies are limited so get yours before it's gone.

NBA 2K22 puts the entire basketball universe in your hands. PLAY NOW in real NBA and WNBA environments against authentic teams and players. Build your own dream team in MyTEAM with today’s stars and yesterday’s legends. Live out your own pro journey in MyCAREER and experience your personal rise to the NBA. Flex your management skills as a powerful Executive in MyGM and MyLEAGUE. Anyone, anywhere can hoop in NBA 2K22.

name: NBA 2K22: NBA 75th Anniversary Edition
description:
NBA 2K22 puts the entire basketball universe in your hands. PLAY NOW in real NBA and WNBA environments against authentic teams and players. Build your own dream team in MyTEAM with today’s stars and yesterday’s legends. Live out your own pro journey in MyCAREER and experience your personal rise to the NBA. Flex your management skills as a powerful Executive in MyGM and MyLEAGUE. Anyone, anywhere can hoop in NBA 2K22.

The NBA 2K22 NBA 75th Anniversary Edition includes:
• 100,000 VC
• 10,000 MyTEAM Points
• 10 MyTEAM Tokens
• Sapphire Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Dirk Nowitzki, and Kevin Durant MyTEAM Cards
• 22 MyTEAM Promo Packs (Receive 10 at launch, then 3 per week for 4 weeks)
• Diamond Jordan Shoe MyTEAM card
• Coach Card MyTEAM Pack
• 10 Boosts for each MyCAREER Skill Boost type
• 10 Boosts for each Gatorade Boost type
• 4 Cover Athlete T-Shirts for your MyPLAYER
• MyPLAYER backpack and arm sleeve
• Custom-design skateboard for MyPLAYER

name: NBA 2K22: Cross-Gen Digital Bundle
description:
NBA 2K22 puts the entire basketball universe in your hands. Play now in real NBA and WNBA environments against authentic teams and players. Build your own dream team in MyTEAM with today’s stars and yesterday’s legends. Live out your own pro journey in MyCAREER and experience your personal rise to the NBA. Flex your management skills as a powerful Executive in MyGM and MyLEAGUE. Anyone, anywhere can hoop in NBA 2K22.

This edition includes NBA 2K22 for older and current platforms.

name: Greats of the Gridiron
description: Greats of the Gridiron is a football simulation experience where must Outdraft, Outdesign, and Outcoach other coaches to stake your claim to Greatness.

name: Psych
description: Experience the story of Alexander Green and find out what happened on the day of the accident in this First Person horror Adventure. Follow the development of Alex, solve puzzles around the event and try not to fall into madness as you search for answers.

name: System Zero
description: System Zero is a hacker simulation game. You must use your hacking tools for accessing to the devices. You will become a black hat who wants to make his living.

name: Life is Strange: True Colors
description: Life is Strange is a series of award-winning and critically-acclaimed narrative adventure games. Discover a universe where everyday heroes wield supernatural powers, while dealing with real challenges, real relationships, and real emotions. It's our world... with a twist of the strange. No matter your choices, the experience will stay with you forever. Deep in the mountains of Colorado, you'll find Haven Springs, a small mining town filled with beauty and mystery. As Alex, you'll discover the shocking secrets behind your brother’s death in an emotional roller-coaster of an adventure, using your psychic power of Empathy to change fate and change lives.

name: Kraken Academy!!
description: Make friends, free spirits and make sure that the world doesn’t end! Welcome to Kraken Academy, a technicolor fever dream that for legal reasons can only be described as "technically a school." Join forces with a magical kraken to manipulate a time loop and save the world.

name: Wildemist Isle
description: Wildemist Isle, a 3D Open World Adventure Card Game.

name: The Rewinder
description:
The Rewinder is a 2D puzzle adventure game inspired by traditional Chinese folklore.

The game uses pixel art to mimic the aesthetics of Chinese ink paintings. Players will get to meet mythological figures such as the Spirit Wardens, the Ox-head and Horse-face Guardians of the Beyond, and the Tudi Gong (Keeper of the Land).

The player takes on the role of Qi Yun, a "rewinder" who has the ability to enter people's memories and influence their actions. By utilizing "senses" and swaying others' "intentions", he can change history.

name: Lost in Random
description: Welcome to the world of Random, a dark kingdom where every citizen’s future is determined by the roll of a dice. Will you be defeated by your fate or embrace chaos and learn to make it work in your favor? Embark on a journey with Even and her sidekick Dicey to play the odds and break the curse of Random.

name: Tales of Arise
description:
On the planet Dahna, reverence has always been given to Rena--the planet in the sky--as a land of the righteous and divine. Stories handed down for generations became truth and masked reality for the people of Dahna. For 300 years, Rena has ruled over Dahna, pillaging the planet of its resources and stripping people of their dignity and freedom.

Our tale begins with two people, born on different worlds, each looking to change their fate and create a new future. Featuring a diverse cast of characters, intuitive and rewarding combat system, and a captivating story set in a lush world worth fighting for, Tales of Arise delivers a first-class JRPG experience.

name: Mario vs. Luigi Reloaded
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal Golf
description: Portal Golf is a physics puzzle game with portals. Place portals around the level in order to get the ball to collect every gold bar. You have no control over the movement of the ball and can only place portals before you start the run. Try to use as few portals as possible to earn medals, or just fill the whole level with portals and have fun!

name: Vargverse
description: Vargverse is a fighting game made in M.U.G.E.N based on streamer Vinesauce Joel.

name: Spyragon
description:
Spyragon is a casual puzzle game for those who love a fun and strategic challenge. The goal is to find, position, and combine matches around the hexagonal diamond-board. The game may seem simple, but mastering it is anything but. Every move creates new opportunities. How many Stars/Combos/Hexagons will you create?

Includes a Classic mode, a Speed mode with a timer, and a Fusion mode where you place the shapes on the board.

name: Goliath: Playing With Reality
description: Narrated by Tilda Swinton, winner of Best VR Work at the 78th Venice International Film Festival and Emmy-nominated Goliath: Playing With Reality is a 25-minute animated VR experience about a man who spent years isolated in psychiatric institutions but finds connection in multiplayer games.

name: Space Tower Defense
description: Welcome in Space Tower Defense where you must to defend your own castle from the waves of monsters. Rush in and protect your own castle right now!

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy Navy Cruiser/Battleship/Aircraft Carrier to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 046.

name: Loco Launcher
description: You're an animal with an appetite for destruction. Use a cannon, vehicle, ride in a giant rock, or simply run through walls to destroy buildings as fast as possible. Have fun in these wacky arcade levels with added abilities that make no sense whatsoever!

name: 3 Days of Tactical Farming
description: A very small and fairly short strategy based farming game.

name: For Honor: Season 19 - Tempest
description: Year of the Covenants: Season 3, named "Tempest," is the nineteenth season of the ongoing Faction War. Warriors prayed for an answer for their parched throats during the drought... and it was answered. But, the answer these warriors received from their gods was much more than simple rain, but a roaring storm, ready to wipe all who remained unprepared.

name: Deep Dungeon
description: A roguelike for the Gameboy, built in GB Studio. GBCOMPO21 Entry.

name: Thumper: Pocket Edition+
description: Thumper is rhythm violence: classic action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the void and confront a maniacal giant head. With this special pocket edition, you can play all nine epic levels with one hand. Hurtle forward, master new moves, and survive terrifying boss battles. Propelled by a pounding original soundtrack, you'll feel every crushing impact. To reach synesthetic bliss, you must conquer rhythm hell.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PREG B16mnopux 087
description: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP049
description: About This is a shoot em up game , In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy to win the game Feature The DLC include mission pack 049.
