description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC includes map pack 090.

name: Tiger Striker: MP084
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC includes map pack 084.

name: Rhythm Brawl
description: Rhythm Brawl is a versus-rhythm game about taking part in band battles with a story mode based on rivalries between talented musicians. It is easy to learn but hard to master.

name: AKB48 World
description: Sin descripción

name: SnowRunner: Jeep Dual Pack
description: Expand your SnowRunner garage with the Jeep Dual Pack, bringing you two new iconic scouts from the legendary brand: The Wrangler-Rubicon and the CJ-7 “Renegade”. These light-weight, time-tested scouts from Jeep have earned their place in any endeavour to conquer the wilderness.

name: The Well
description: The Well is a compact (avg. play time 20 mins) one-button horror game based off of a poem by HP Lovecraft.

name: Holiday Jigsaw Easter
description: New Holiday Jigsaw and 500 beautiful Easter photos!

name: Danger Zombies
description: Danger zombies is a game with plenty of suspense and plenty of action, where the character will have many challenges to complete the objective of surviving, we've already started armed and ready for battle, we'll have a long-range rifle, a short-range pistol and an ax for hand-to-hand combat.

name: Detective Solitaire: The Ghost Agency
description: 200 magical layouts - find all the evidence! Visit a magical world right now!

name: Arcade Archives: Pop Flamer
description: Pop Flamer is an action game released by Jaleco in 1982. Players control the Pop Flamer to defeat monsters as they pop all the balloons in each stage. You'll need to refuel your flamethrower by popping balloons, since the flames get weaker each time you use it.

name: Draknek and Friends Puzzle Bundle
description: From some of the best puzzle designers in the world comes the Draknek and Friends Puzzle Bundle, a collection of four of the best puzzle games in the last decade. With dozens of hours of fun, this bundle is a must-have for puzzle fans. Headlining the bundle is critically beloved A Monster’s Expedition, an open world puzzle game about exploring the museum of Human Englandland. Players of all skill levels can enjoy hundreds of islands - some right in front of you, others well off the beaten track for true puzzle lovers In Cosmic Express, create pathways to navigate the galaxy’s most awkward space colony. It's cute, harder than it looks, and guaranteed to give you hours of challenging fun across hundreds of levels. In A Good Snowman is Hard to Build, players can continue exploring the world of A Monster’s Expedition while rolling up snowballs to become snowfriends. The easiest and most accessible of the four games, this game is a delight for all ages. In Sokobond, move atoms to form increasingly complex molecules through over one hundred levels of challenging puzzles in Draknek’s first commercial release.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 7
description: Spend a sensational summer vacation helping rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s conservation challenge year and Pinecreek’s better than ever before!

name: Brink Traveler
description: BRINK Traveler is a virtual travel experience that takes you to amazing natural locations in full 3D to feel like you're really there. Step into a postcard and visit some of the most breathtaking places on Earth today!

name: Bubble Shooter FX
description:
Bubble Shooter FX is a classic bubble shoot game.

This addictive classic bubble blast match-three game comes with clean and modern graphics, hundreds of great challenging levels and some nice special items for better game experience in harder levels.

Clean and simple 3D graphics with nice light effects gives the game a special touch.

name: Color Connect
description: Color Connect is a fun VR puzzle game with an immersive environment and a relaxing ambient playlist to suit. Lose yourself in space with over 50+ challenging levels, putting your gray matter to the test. It's simple to learn but challenging to master!

name: Super
description: Super is a battle royale filled with superheroes and supervillains in the city of Centropolis. Start as a regular citizen and find a crystal to obtain your super powers and help the villains make money or the heroes stop them!

name: Cabous
description: A first-person thriller exploration game, based on a true story. Centered around the memory-driven nightmares of a young woman who has been imprisoned by her childhood trauma. Release all the memories locked in and beware of the creatures of the night.

name: Hajwala Line
description: HAJWALA LINE Game that designed to match your requirements. New challenge make you collect coins and buy new cars and open new levels.

name: Vortex
description: Welcome to the VortexLabs testing facility. Here we will test your ability to solve various puzzles in order for you to make your escape.

name: Nagare-boshi
description: NAGARE-BOSHI is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Cure Obsession
description: This is a stress relieving game

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Season 1: Phalanx
description:
Each season of the game features free content updates, starting with Season 1: Phalanx, named for its new Class.

Season 1: Phalanx features the following free content:
New Class Kit: the combat shield-wielding "Phalanx", with 15 Kit-Specific Perks
4 New Weapons
New Cosmetic Rewards (head accessory, weapon colorways and decals)

name: The Final Frontier
description: The Last Frontier is a retro multi-directional shooter inspired by the likes of Asteroids and Galaga. You destroy waves of endless enemies while trying to survive as long as possible by upgrading your ship's abilities along the way.

name: Bubble Breaking
description: Bubbles come in different sizes (depths) and they rise at different speeds. Players have 60 seconds to pop as many as they can. When bubbles are popped points are scored. The smaller, faster bubbles score more points than the bigger, slower bubbles. Beware of the 'stink' bubbles.

name: Smash MAGA! Trump Zombie Apocalypse
description: Anti-fascist gamers fight the Trump Zombie plague in this spree of rioting and looting!

name: Ardarium
description: Watch nations grow and forests spread in this casual sandbox game where everything is automatic and gameplay is optional. It's like a screensaver that you can play. Make explosions that deform the ground, start forest fires, trigger earthquakes that wipe out civilizations, or just watch the sunrise.

name: Spell Swap
description: A 2D wizard fighting game about swapping spells with your opponents. Everyone gets their own spell and swaps on impact! Use your spell to kill your opponents... or use it to steal their own!

name: The Vampire Regent
description: Rule over a secret society of vampires in a game full of political intrigue, occult powers, and conflicting loyalties. Will you play or be played?

name: Smash Reversi
description: "Reversi" that supports Internet battles is now available on "Nintendo Switch! There are 3 types of play modes. "Solo Play" to play against AI. "Internet Play" to play with people on the net. "Local Play" to play with your friends. There are various stages such as a wide board, a narrow board, and a tricky board with many holes. If you take the "Buster Bomb" placed on the board, you can make all the pieces in the direction of the arrow your own color. Let's play with "Smash Reversi" and get excited together!

name: Wild Pinball Bundle
description: Enjoy 3 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, dinosaurs, lions, elephants and sharks awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Ball Physics Draw Puzzles
description: Ball Physics Draw Puzzles is a simple and a fun puzzle game with the goal to guide all balls into a cup just by drawing paths on the screen. Draw Shapes with physical forces act to them and complete challenging puzzles.

name: Puzzle Fever
description: Puzzle fever - Endless game for puzzle lovers! Place figures on the playing field to fill in lines and get coins and points for successful combinations, use bonuses in difficult situations and conquer point records!

name: KaraDedeler 1989
description: Journalist Mustafa, who heard the news of the "jinn" raid in one of the remote villages of Turkey in 1988, immediately got in his car to investigate the incident and set off.

name: The Octots
description: The Octots tells the story of a community caught between the primitive world and the present world. You will give life to a character whose entire family was killed by the enemy tribe and then escaped from them. Survive against hunger, thirst, wild jungle life.

name: The Sand Dunes
description: The Sand Dunes is an action game with shooter and bullet hell elements in which you will fight to save the remains of your people. The ancient Gods have been corrupt and they must rest.

name: Geometric Sniper: Blood in Paris
description: Katy, a French sniper, needs to protect her magnificent city! A 2D sniper game like you've never seen! In this spin-off of the Geometric Sniper the missions are more and more challenging, you will not have a second chance. Accuracy is everything!

name: NBA 2K22
description: NBA 2K22 puts the entire basketball universe in your hands. Play now in real NBA and WNBA environments against authentic teams and players. Build your own dream team in MyTeam with today’s stars and yesterday’s legends. Live out your own pro journey in MyCareer and experience your personal rise to the NBA. Flex your management skills as a powerful Executive in MyGM and MyLeague. Anyone, anywhere can hoop in NBA 2K22.

name: Dream Back
description: Dream back Dream back is an open-world sandbox development game with rich and colorful gameplay. In order to ensure absolute personalization, everyone is welcome to complain and feedback, and I will fix it as quickly as possible. Welcome to join the official QQ group: 619641228

name: Sleepy Sunday
description: Welcome to your happiest nightmare! Fight your way through hordes of powerful enemies and meet a colorful cast of companions in this action-packed 2D roguelite!

name: Espgaluda II
description: Espgaluda II is a manic shooter originally released by Cave in the arcades in 2005 as a sequel to Espgaluda, and it has now found its way to Nintendo Switch.

name: WarioWare: Get It Together!
description: Take on over 200 quick and quirky microgames - lightning-fast minigames filled with frantic fun - solo or with a friend! When his latest harebrained business scheme goes awry, Wario must use his signature style (and smell) to fix it. How? By playing a twisted collection microgames of course! From assembling a robot to pulling out a statue's armpit hair, the WarioWare: Get It Together! game is a comedic, cooperative microgame mashup.

name: BloodRayne Betrayal: Fresh Bites
description: Original developer WayForward upgrades its 2011 classic with new voice acting by Laura Bailey and Troy Baker, sharpened visuals, and rebalanced gameplay. Run, jump, cut, and feed your way through a massive underground castle to confront Rayne’s father at the behest of the Brimstone Society.

name: Gate to Site 8
description: Gate to Site 8 is a short, dark story-driven game about the traumatic childhood of two brothers. You venture back home and try to remember the fragmented memories of your past.

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - 30th Anniversary Pack
description:
The Anniversary Pack contains:

- Base game
- Art book
- OST
- Sonic 30th Anniversary Collector’s Coin

name: Fool's Paradise
description: He's alone and keeps in a fool's paradise. Help Jack to open his eyes by getting through his dark adventure to the truth. Solve puzzles, explore Jack's memories and enjoy the ambient soundtrack.

name: SnowRunner: Season 5 - Build & Dispatch
description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 5: Build & Dispatch. Restore an old Tatra factory in Rostov Oblast, Russia, with two new maps to explore alongside two new Tatra vehicles.

name: Tales of Arise: Collector's Edition
description:
Featuring a diverse cast of characters, an intuitive and rewarding combat system, and a captivating story set in a lush world worth fighting for, Tales of Arise delivers a first-class JRPG experience.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: Tales of Arise
- Exclusive 18-cm Alphen and Shionne figurine
- Exclusive Luxury Box
- Art book
- Original Soundtrack
- Logo Metal Pin Badge
- Illustration Sticker
- Acrylic Figure
- Post Cards
- Accessory Doll DLC

name: Tales of Arise: Premium Edition
description:
Featuring a diverse cast of characters, an intuitive and rewarding combat system, and a captivating story set in a lush world worth fighting for, Tales of Arise delivers a first-class JRPG experience.

The Premium Edition includes:
- Game: Tales of Arise
- Exclusive Luxury Box
- Art book
- Original Soundtrack
- Logo Metal Pin Badge
- Illustration Sticker
- Acrylic Figure
- Post Cards

name: Life is Strange: True Colors - Deluxe Edition
description:
Alex Chen must embrace her volatile psychic power of Empathy to uncover the truth about her brother's death.

The Life is Strange: True Colors Deluxe edition contains:
- Life is Strange: True Colors: the complete game.
- Exclusive Bonus Story: ‘Wavelengths’: play as Steph in the year before Alex came to Haven Springs, in a standalone story set in the iconic Rocky Mountain Record Traders store and KRCT radio station.
- Exclusive Life is Strange Hero Outfit Pack: change up Alex's look with 4 new outfits inspired by past protagonists. The pack includes clothing inspired by Chloe’s Misfit Skull, Sean’s Wolf Squad, Daniel’s Space Mission, and Max’s Jane Doe outfits, with one outfit available for Alex to wear in each chapter of the main game.

name: Life is Strange: True Colors - Ultimate Edition
description:
Alex Chen must embrace her psychic power of Empathy to uncover the truth about her brother's death.

The Ultimate Edition contains:
- Life is Strange: True Colors
- Exclusive Bonus Story: ‘Wavelengths’
- Exclusive Life is Strange Hero Outfit Pack
- Life is Strange Remastered
- Life is Strange: Before the Storm Remastered
- Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Zombie Crypt Outfit

name: Residual
description: Explore an uncharted world of forgotten alien tech & lore, while crafting your way to freedom and stopping the spread of the ooze, a tenacious galactic menace! Brought to you by Apogee, THE original indie publisher, famous for Wolfenstein, Duke Nukem, Rise of the Triad, Prey & Max Payne.

name: Rico London
description: Rico London is a gang-busting, name-taking, explosive cooperative shooter. Blast your way up the highrise tower stacked with East End gangsters solo or with a partner. Crash through doors, dodge bullets, turn the weapons of the fallen into your personal arsenal, and do whatever it takes to make it to the top.

name: The Gardener and the Wild Vines
description: The Gardener and the Wild Vines is a story-based platformer where the platforms are procedurally generated each time the Gardener cuts and collects a flower.

name: Webbed
description:
Webbed is the story of a happy little spider on an adventure to save her boyfriend from a big mean bowerbird.
Swing through the trees, spin sticky webs, and make friends with bugs! Be the adorable spider you've always wanted to be.

name: Arboria
description: Begin your journey in this dark fantasy rogue-lite. As a warrior, a Yotun, descend into the ever-changing Durnar and uncover the mysteries of your tribe. Use a variety of Symbiotic Weapons to fight enemies and mutate to become even stronger.

name: Agent Roswell
description: A first and third person action shooter for PC. Set in 1969 USA, you are an Agent working for a secret Government Agency and your task is to investigate and help stop an Alien invasion, your work will also deal with a terrorist organisation who want to reveal the truth about the invasion to the public.

name: Ultra Age
description: Ultra Age follows the story of a young warrior named Age, who embarks on a mission to save humankind from extinction. He must use his blades to cut through robotic and mutant foes, explore futuristic locales, and unravel a vast conspiracy concerning the fate of the planet.

name: Terrain of Magical Expertise
description: "A turn-based RPG about a turn-based RPG! Play as the mysterious "White-Hat Hacker" and help your fellow players achieve victory against a group of filthy cheaters! Based on the "Terrain of Magical Expertise" webseries by Chris Niosi!"

name: The Artful Escape
description: On the eve of his first performance, Francis Vendetti battles with the legacy of a dead folk legend and the cosmic wanderings of his own imagination. In this 2D adventure platformer, Francis, a teenage guitar prodigy, sets out on a psychedelic, multidimensional journey to inspire his stage persona.

name: Psicosis
description:
Psicosis is a 2D psychological horror game.

In Psicosis you'll accompany William to live between hallucination and reality, experiencing moments of confusion and psychological pressure with high levels of suspense.

In Psicosis you will find diverse scenarios, in which you will have to solve puzzles to advance in the game

name: Report III
description: Part 3 of the mod from the Report series, will tell you about the subsequent adventures of Gerald. About his confrontations with the new enemies of humanity, as well as the old villains who are still hungry for revenge after 20 years.

name: Fallout 76: Season 6 - The Unstoppables! vs The Diabolicals
description: The Unstoppables! vs The Diabolicals was the sixth season in Fallout 76. It began on September 8, 2021, with the release of the Fallout Worlds update. It follows Escape from the 42nd Century and was followed by Zorbo's Revenge.

name: Pong
description: Sin descripción

name: Blasphemous Experiments
description: Blasphemous experiments is a complete first episode replacement for Heretic, using the Blasphemer texture pack.

name: The Last Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Sure Instinct
description:
Sure Instinct is a skill based puzzle-game. Steer a ball through challenging maps to the goal of each stage.
By changing the perspective, you can reach objects on two different sides of each map. Avoid falling down into the abyss or to lose your health on dangerous objects. Collect items to reach new sections or to find hidden paths.

Can you find the way to the goal, beat the high score or find the fastest path through the stages?

name: Cuberuns
description: Sin descripción

name: Snook
description: Snook is an arcade multiplayer browser game where players control a snake-like NFT avatar, which consumes pellets of coins from other players, and ones that naturally spawn on the map in the game to grow in size. The objective of the game is to be the last one standing on the map

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PREG Bmnopux 003
description: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Night Hunter
description: A unique, one of a kind hunting experience. Call and hunt predators, earn money and upgrade to better equipment. Are you the next Night Hunter?

name: Galactigun
description: Galactigun is a music rhythm space shooter designed for touch screen devices. Travel through the synthwave torrent, destroying enemy ships to the beat. Use precise timing to accelerate your score and rank.

name: HotGirls Sliding Puzzle
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring sexy girls and waitresses in a night club. Discover beautiful women in a nightclub setting by solving puzzles.

name: Halloween Riddles Mysterious Griddlers
description: Trick or treat? 120 terribly exciting nonograms in Halloween Riddles: Mysterious Griddlers! Horrribly fun!

name: Holiday Jigsaw Halloween
description: Halloween adventure waits you in Holiday Jigsaw!

name: Brambles in the Mist
description: In this SRPG, you play as a bard traveling in a foreign land in search of your muse. During your journey, you will meet numerous women to serve as your muses and also have romantic interactions with them. Faced with a common enemy that threatens the kingdom, you fight together to save it.

name: Big Klondike: Classic Solitaire
description:
Big Klondike is a version of the very popular Klondike variation of solitaire. This version of solitaire is what generally is called Windows Solitaire, or what some people think Solitaire just is as a general term (when the truth is that Solitaire is a huge genre of games just as wide as FPS is).

Big Klondike features 1 Draw, 3 Draw, Random shuffles and Winnable shuffles. You can choose to have the Timer enabled or not if you prefer a relaxing experience.

Our Winnable shuffles are originally Random shuffles which our custom coded solitaire bot has play tested to ensure is actually possible. We ship the game with 50,000 known Winnable shuffles for both 1 Draw and 3 Draw variations. The 1.0.0 version of our solitaire bot was made to not be too incredibly clever, so all Winnable shuffles are guaranteed to be possible below 200 moves. Though a Winnable game is guaranteed to be possible, that does not mean you will always win it first time as sometimes moves can be made in ways where the game becomes bricked - impossible to finish in that state. If that happens you can Retry that same game and go for different moves to beat it!

In Big Klondike, cards can be dragged or clicked to move them to possible moves. Right click is also supported.

Once a game is deemed as mostly complete, Big Klondike will show a button to Auto Complete the game and move the rest of the cards into place in the foundations.

name: Shine Within
description: A top-down action-adventure game as you collect & solve puzzles in order for you to explore & unravel this mysterious world.

name: Neon Depth
description: In this puzzle-platform game, you must make mistakes in order to progress. Place blocks when you fail, and shape the level in your favor. Discover how to use blocks with different effects to escape from within yourself while learning to live with your mistakes.

name: The Dawning Clocks of Time
description: A classic story of love, war and betrayal on an intergalatic scale. A epic turn based RPG with both sandbox and linear story progression. Take up arms with energy and exciting weapons and skills for the battle of the ages, who will decide the fate for all of humanity?

name: Plumber 3
description: The Plumber 3 is a popular logical game, whose goal is to connect two water points in a short time to drain the water. This game has 30 levels with a gradually increasing degree of complexity, and the game is ideally suited for mobile devices.

name: Shambled Spiral
description: Singleplayer Genre - Weird/Casual/FPS Purchase now to possibly get a much better version in the future for FREE!

name: Parking light
description: Parking light is a racing game. The goal of the game is to put the bus in the parking space within the allotted time. The game has 104 different levels. To go to the next level you need to get at least one star. Stars stand out for collision-free passage.

name: Infinity war
description: Inifinity War is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game where you will have to defend your capital, explore modules, create tanks and of course fight. To win the game, you need to capture all the enemy capitals.

name: Minesweeper Ultimate
description: Play classic minesweeper or face new challenges in hex and triangular minesweeper modes.

name: Combo Babies
description: Rollback netcode physics-based fighting game made by a solo developer.

name: Jester / King
description: You play the amnesiac jester Madion who woke up next to the king's lifeless body. A curse has fallen upon the kingdom, annihilating almost everyone, and driving the survivors to madness. Madion is torn between seeking the truth, helping the others, and a desire to escape.

name: Casino Roulette Royal
description: Feel lucky today! Now, you can play Casino Roulette Royal anywhere and anytime. Bet without spending money, and enjoy a unique experience! If you are a fan of casino table games, you will love our Roulette. Today, luck is on your side. Develop a good strategy and achieve victory! Become a professional real Roulette blitz player by betting just like in other casino table games without risking your real money!

name: Tux and Fanny
description: Tux and Fanny just want to play soccer but their soccer ball is deflated. Go on an epic adventure to help them inflate their ball. Play as both Tux and Fanny as well as a cat and a flea. All four characters will have to work together if you're going to inflate the ball.

name: Earth Guard: Egypt
description: Grab a weapon and listen to the gods! Play against an endless amount of enemies and defend the ancient Egyptian world in this brand new VR Tower Defense Game.

name: Evil Soul
description: Fight as a half-evil, step into the road to revenge. Build your team and slay around the chaos hell to finally face the Evil Lords.

name: Glo
description: Enter a realm shrouded in darkness and take a leap of blind faith as you try to find a way out. GLO is a simple and rewarding puzzle platformer with an daunting central mechanic – nearly everything that stands between you and your goal is obscured and invisible. Using only the light around you and the glow of your projectiles, you must rely on memory to guide you through the obstacles and hazards that you glimpse. Find reassurance and enlightenment in the messages written on the dark walls, illuminated as you progress and hinting at an emotional story. This is a beautiful and abstract journey across 100 levels, featuring precision controls and an atmospheric soundtrack to drive curiosity and stave off fear of the unknown. It’s minimalistic yet metaphorical, hidden yet ripe for discovery. Will you unlock its secrets?

name: Chicken Cannon!
description: A 3D physics-based rage game. Reach the end of a colorful low poly open world by shooting the chicken from one cannon to another! Compete with the community to get the best time (if you ever manage to finish the game).

name: Splash King's Tournament
description: Splash King's Tournament is an exhilarating, fast paced tournament style multiplayer battle royale, third person shooter game for PC.

name: Panda City
description: Happiness is everything! Build your lowpoly city on a small island and make your inhabitants(pandas) happy. They are asking for a lot of things. Will everybody fit on the island an can you build the perfect home for your population?

name: Final Fantasy IV
description: The original Final Fantasy IV comes to life with completely new graphics and audio! A remodeled 2D take on the fourth game in the world-renowned Final Fantasy series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Rooten
description: There is only you and the Forest. In "Rooten" there are no compulsory tasks, time just goes by, and days pass by independently of you. You can explore the Forest, try to get out, or even do nothing at all. The forest has always been here, and always will be. You won't change it no matter what.

name: Boulder Dash Deluxe
description: The retro game and legendary action puzzler for players young and more experienced alike arrived, combining up-to date-graphics with original game features – spanning 35+ years of Rockford and his friends, digging though caves to collect gems - Boulder Dash Deluxe!

name: Dice Legacy
description: Dice Legacy is a dice-based survival city builder set on a mysterious ringworld. Your ship has reached the shore of an uncharted continent. Roll and use your dice to gather resources, expand and defend your settlement, survive the winter and interact with the strange inhabitants of this eerie world.

name: Protoball
description: Protoball is a futuristic First Person Sports Shooter, a blend of basketball and soccer crossed with high tech futuristic style. Players athletically jump, slide, run, and dash around the arena trying to pass the Protoball through the opponents goal. This is the game you've been waiting for.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: N64 Mario
description: Sin descripción

name: Prototype Textures II
description: 23 small to medium-sized maps using khreathor's Prototype texture wad and Dumptruck's SMP progs

name: Ao to Ao no Sekai
description: Ran and Ao are brothers. Apparently, Ao is being bullied at school...

name: The Temple of Blooooood
description: Large blood temple. The map source is included.

name: Mega Man: Limbo Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: SpongeBob’s Idle Adventures
description: Join SpongeBob & his friends on a F.U.N. idle adventure through dimensions!

name: Waterfall
description: A shadowy figure seeks peace.

name: The King's Crown
description:
After an accident on the way home from your part-time job, you wake up surrounded by three strange girls dressed in what looks like armor…

Before long, you’ve been drawn into a deadly tournament of swords and magic with the ultimate prize: the King’s Crown, a mysterious artifact of incredible power. Your only hope for survival—let alone victory—is trusting in your newfound allies, but the longer you fight, the closer you come to uncovering the dark secrets at the heart of the tournament…

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bus Simulator 21: MAN Bus Pack
description:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!

You want to upgrade your fleet with the content of the "Bus Simulator 21 – Extended Edition", including the fresh design of the new MAN Lion's City 12 city bus with three fancy interior sets? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Protect Nature Interior Pack
description:
When asked what spices up their lives, pedestrians, drivers, and passengers usually agree: variety!

With this "Protect Nature" themed, authentic bus interior pack, including four new, specifically designed color patterns for the seats and attractive floor designs, every virtual bus driver can make a statement about nature conservation.
Customize your bus and make it your own. Enjoy the freedom of choice and try something new.

The next shift is about to begin! So, what are you waiting for? Get in, sit down, and enjoy the fresh interior designs of your buses!

name: Bus Simulator 21: USA Skin Pack
description: This collection of 10 unique paint jobs opens the door to a land of unlimited visual opportunities while you drive the streets of Angel Shores and Seaside Valley.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Angel Shores Insider Skin Pack
description: This collection of 10 unique paint jobs lets you represent the new USA map "Angel Shores", as well as its sights and secret spots, while you drive the streets of Angel Shores and Seaside Valley.

name: Mermaid Shores
description: A summer visit to your aunt’s home leads to a very memorable encounter with an unforgettable merboy. When the two of you reconnect many years later, you realize a little too late that handsome mermen aren’t the only secrets that lie within the ocean’s depths…

name: Holoquest
description: Holoquest is a comical JRPG featuring the girls of HoloMyth: Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, Watson Amelia, Ninomae Ina'nis, and Gawr Gura. Familiarity with Hololive and its characters is not required to play and complete the game.

name: WRC 10: Subaru Impreza WRC 1997
description: Get behind the wheel of the legendary car driven by Colin McRae and Nicky Grist in 1997, and relive their victory at the Rallye Sanremo in the same year.

name: Harvest Moon: One World - Precious Pets Pack
description: From Siamese cats to silver dapple horses, the Precious Pets Pack includes 12 unique animals that will love settling down on your farm!

name: In the Bush
description: In the bush is a casual rougelike where you play as a fly who needs to clear the stage from other insects to proceed to the next stage. At the start of each stage you get to select a mod that makes you stronger.

name: Castlevania: Rondo of Ruin
description: Castlevania Rondo of Ruin is a Castlevania Portrait of Ruin romhack aiming to modify most of the games content. There is a new story, new items, sprites, weapons, music, and most of the games areas are modified in both small and big ways. Set 5 years after the events of Symphony of the Night, join Richter Belmont, Maria Renard and their companions as they work to unravel what has caused Castlevania’s early return to the world of humans.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Extended Edition
description: Experience the daily life of a bus driver in two open world cities either in the USA or Europe. Drive up to 30 licensed buses by international manufacturers, including a double-decker and e-buses. Take your passengers to their destinations safely and on time - either in single- or multiplayer mode.

name: Fill and Cross: Trick or Treat 2
description: Trick or treat? No tricks! 120 new Halloween-themed levels is a real treat for griddlers fans on Halloween!

name: Animalia Survival
description: Live as your favourite african animal, choose between being a carnivore, herbivore or omnivore, predator or prey. In this multiplayer ecosystem, with a realistic open world, choose to become a lion, a elephant or even a swift gazelle! But remember, the savannahs law is to survive at any cost!

name: 2 Synchro Hedgehogs
description: A puzzle-platformer with two hedgehogs moving in sync! Polish your logic by controlling a team of twins in one move!

name: OnlyGame: Working Girls
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood with sexy girls.

name: 天气
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead by Daylight: Hellraiser Chapter
description: Hellraiser is a new Chapter in Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, Pinhead. Demon to some, angel to others Pinhead seeks to unleash the limitless thrill of pleasure and pain upon any who cross his path. Purchasing the add-on will unlock the new Killer and an exclusive universal charm.

name: Don't Hate My Music Taste
description: Don't Hate My Music Taste is a first person shooter with a dynamic map that changes according to the playing music. You play your music so that no one can hate your music taste.

name: Mana Go Round
description: A fantastical puzzle game where you match mana and magic circles to cast spells, clear the field, and win!

name: Detention Club: School's Out
description: Detention Club: School's Out is a femdom game featuring a visual novel interface that blends seamlessly with gruelling turn based boss fights to progress the story.

name: Lost in Space
description: Lost in Space is an open space survival adventure game. You have received a distress signal from a spacecraft.

name: Can Androids Survive
description:
Becoming a walking, 2-ton supply line in a new shortform sandbox mech FPS from the writer of Can Androids Pray. In Can Androids Survive, you are a battlefield courier, sent to an active warzone on the Moon to deliver supplies to Starbound Alliance bases--even if it costs your life in the process. Battle a draining fuel gauge, hordes of mechanized hazards, and a treacherous lunar surface to unravel the nature of your existence. Jettison fuel through your exhaust ports to escape stellar float mines and launch your chassis across craters. End the war itself--by destroying the field.

In 2143, a rogue AI commandeers the defense satellites surrounding a dead Earth, and blows up the Moon.

This is how you do it.

name: FGTeev Goozy
description: Explore a house full of weird technology and slimy surprises as you attempt to save the FGTeeV family.

name: Blon
description: Blon is a cute pixel-art 2D platformer game. Unlock spells, heroes and weapons, fight monsters and bosses and explore an unknown world in hopes of rescuing your family.

name: Escape From School
description: Confused, you wake up sucked into an empty classroom. You have to try to escape from school by solving puzzles and discovering secrets.

name: Metal Swarm Infinity
description: Enter an ever changing, randomly generated galaxy and battle the Metal Swarm menance in this arcade style shoot 'em up. Blast through hordes of bugs, collect powerups and battle giant bosses as you harvest their power cores to upgrade your ship.

name: Hypoxia: One Last Breath
description: A breathtaking sci-fi visual novel! Since the Z gas appeared in the atmosphere, it is no longer possible to breath outside the Dome. You play as Carl Thanavan, a young scientist determined to uncover the origin of the catastrophe. Which path will you choose?

name: Ark of Loif
description: Ark of Loif, Hardcore Action Shooter – RPG.

name: Marble Mage
description: Dash and roll your way through 60 fast-paced levels to try and find the way back home after a magic exam goes wrong, leaving a young mage stranded in a strange dimension. Marble Mage offers classic marble-rolling platforming with a unique twist: Charge up and release to blast off in any direction!

name: Surviving Mars: Below and Beyond
description: Key Features Back to the Bases - Expand your colony into caves and lava tubes under the surface. Mine Your Own Business - Go below the surface and beyond the red planet to mine new resources. Branching Paths - The Recon and Expansion research trees unlock additional features for exploration.

name: Knight's Edge
description: Choose your weapon and take to the field in Knight’s Edge! Slay the monsters with your team, racing to see who will come out on top.

name: American Truck Simulator: Wyoming
description: Wyoming may be one of the least populated states in the U.S, but that doesn't mean that it lacks spectacular places to visit and see. Home to some of the country's most breathtaking national parks, Wyoming is best known for its red-walled gorges, hot springs, historic prairie towns, pioneer history, and historical attractions.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodhunt
description: Bloodhunt is a thrilling free-to-play battle royale game set in Prague consumed by a ruthless war between vampire clans. Use your supernatural powers to hunt and outsmart your rivals and Inquisition soldiers in this third-person action shooter. Gear up, feed on potent blood to grow in power, defy gravity to strike from anywhere, and dominate the night!

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Launch Edition
description: Join Sonic on an intergalactic journey, fully remastered for a new generation -- with a few new features, too! The launch edition comes with a baby Sonic keychain!

name: Seishin Destiny
description: A powerful Oni and his army invaded the earth, cursing all mankind to roam the land without rest. Years later the spirits found a way to take possession of bodies through masks to finally face the demons and get rid of this curse.

name: Placebo Love
description: A lonely young man is guided by a silent Muse to solve the mystery behind his two Doppelganger Soulmates.

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate
description: Join Sonic in the high-speed adventure of a lifetime across a colorful interstellar amusement park. Color the Universe in Sonic Colors: Ultimate!

name: Anti-Science Brigade
description: 15-year-old Avani is tricked into starting an anti-science mob to pay off her mother's medical debts. Use classic turn-based tactics to convince the town to join your cause. It's silly. It's sad. It's scary. It's the Anti-Science Brigade. 50% of profits go to National Center for Science Education.

name: Tennis Manager 2021
description: Do you have what it takes to become the greatest tennis manager? Enter your academy, manage your team, plan your trainings, schedule your tournaments, change your game plans and find out the new young guns. Take the reins, make the right decisions, become the best one!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Day One Edition
description:
Experience the daily life of a bus driver in two open world cities either in the USA or Europe. Drive up to 30 licensed buses by international manufacturers, including a double-decker and e-buses.

The Day One Edition includes the Main Game of Bus Simulator 21, the Protect Nature Interior Pack (4 Interiors) and the USA Skin Pack (10 Skins).

name: Bus Simulator 21
description: Experience the daily life of a bus driver in two open world cities either in the USA or Europe. Drive up to 30 licensed buses by international manufacturers, including a double-decker and e-buses. Take your passengers to their destinations safely and on time - either in single- or multiplayer mode.

name: Rogue Shift
description: Rogue Shift is a high-intensity rogue-lite experience with RPG elements, set on a harsh planet that will test your will to survive.

name: Milo and the Magpies
description: Milo and the Magpies is a point-and-click, hidden object game following the story of a little cat named Milo who is trying to find his way home after getting turned around by an unfortunate encounter with some pesky magpies.

name: Sluggish Morss: Pattern Circus
description: A claymation 2d adventure game set in a dark and cryptic future. Another Time Expression, a temporal interference phenomenon, has been predicted leaving those that govern anxious. You will discover its effects on the lives of eight playable characters; a hunter, a dreamer, an artist, a child; a racer, a fighter, a scientist and a detective. Explore an intricate, tactile world full of feverish, intertwining stories told with humour, irreverence and melancholy.

name: F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch
description: It is a metroidvania game that the player will play as a rabbit who can manipulate the big mech-arm on his back, exploring in a vivid diesel punk world and fighting against the evil robot army. There will be a vast world map for the player to explore to meet with friend NPCs and encounter enemies, discover items and weapons and seek for the answers for the secrets hidden behind.

name: Encased
description:
Encased is a modern single player sci-fi post-apocalyptic isometric role-playing game. It’s all about exploration, adventures, and survival inside a locked up territory.

It is heavily inspired by famous isometric RPGs of the late 90s and early 2000s but aims not only to repeat those essential aspects that made them golden classic but also to improve those and evolve even further.

The player is a participant in a project researching the technology and artifacts of a long-gone civilization. Wonderful discoveries, mysterious artifacts, and dangerous anomalies are constant companions of this activity.

name: Wavy trip
description: Wavy trip is and endless runner game, based on controling the spaceship, passsing throught rings and avoiding the walls.

name: Magic Star
description:
Idol development system, popular social music game! Welcome everyone to Nico's singing and dancing world~

Magic Star is a music game with a lively style using the concept of idols!
Gorgeous costumes, personalized mounts, massive music songs, everything you want is here. Scroll down quickly and let Nico introduce it to you, idols!

name: SMW Quest for Gaming
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Metroid: Unhundred %
description: Play Super Metroid... in reverse! Samus starts with every upgrade available and has to bring them back to their original position, becoming weaker over the course of the game.

name: Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level
description:
After all the work he's been doing for so many years, Mega Man is finally taking a well-deserved vacation. The Light family has set sail on a luxury cruise ship, the SS Elroy! Unfortunately, it seems an up-and-coming group of ne'er-do-wells has set their sights on the same cruise. Before long, it's up to Mega Man to blast through the cruise's Simulation Fair in an effort to gather enough Energy Elements to save the day!

Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level (MaG48HMML, or just 48H) was held to test and refine the Megamix Engine in preparation for MaGMML3. Participants had 48 hours to create a level using randomly selected enemies and gimmicks from across the entire Classic Mega Man series. Levels were evaluated and ranked by a panel of 4 judges, and an elaborate game was built around the results. Unlike the main MaGMMLs, participants were not allowed to program custom objects for their levels - but that doesn't mean this game isn't just as wacky and innovative as previous ones.

48H is a spiritual successor to Make a Good 24 Hour Mega Man Level that takes place between MaGMML2 and MaGMML3, but no previous MaGMML knowledge is necessary to enjoy the story.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Hotline 024
description: Meet Nikku, an alien girl that crashed on earth and was captured by a secret agency, she has been used for experimentation for years, until one day she was able to escape and decided to hide in an abandoned mall.

name: Frog Finder
description: A cute lightweight puzzle game. Can you find the frog?

name: Hammerheart
description: Punishing, strategic and with a heavy focus on authenticity, Hammerheart is a hardcore roguelike set in the viking age that combines directional medieval combat with party customization and strategy mechanics.

name: Hope Trigger
description: Hope Trigger is a perma-death Side-Scrolling RPG game. The game features fighting monsters, creating gears and using combo skills, magic to battle.

name: Jetman Fly Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Check-In
description: Check-In is a mix between word games and trivia, packed as an online game show hosted by a streamer while its viewers compete for the win.

name: Splash Girls
description: Splash Girls is a game to play with cute girls. Please enjoy spending time by the water. The game has beautiful graphics and passionate voice.

name: World of Paranoia
description: WORLD OF PARANOIA is a management game where the player controls a supercomputer that is in charge of governing an utopia.

name: Brain Games
description: A collection of popular classic games for brain improved and entertainment.

name: Passive Income
description: Passive Income is an idle-ish simulator game where you can build houses, get upgrades, and gain money over time! Chill out and relax as you rip rent out of little cartoon people's pockets. Grow your passive income now!

name: Pandemic Pandemonium
description: Pandemic Pandemonium is a fast paced arcade shooter for the 2020s with a rocking synthwave soundtrack.
